Package io.github.jgame.event

Class DesktopUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.jgame.event.DesktopUtils
  • public class DesktopUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Easy way to perform actions such as opening the webbrowser and printing files to the local printer.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static java.awt.Desktop desktop
      Internal desktop object.
      private static java.util.logging.Logger logger
      Internal logger object used for event logging.
      private static boolean supported
      Boolean value of whether desktops as a whole are even allowed on the machine.

      Format URI from arguments and call mailTo(URI) URI is formatted from the string "mailto:%s?subject=%s&cc=%s&body=%s&bcc=%s"

      Try to open URI in the default mail client.

      • mailTo

        public static boolean mailTo​(java.lang.String sendTo,
                             java.lang.String subject,
                             java.lang.String cc,
                             java.lang.String body,
                             java.lang.String bcc)
        Format URI from arguments and call mailTo(URI) URI is formatted from the string "mailto:%s?subject=%s&cc=%s&body=%s&bcc=%s"
        Parameters:
        sendTo - Address(es) to send mail to.
        subject - Subject of email
        cc - CC
        body - Body of email
        bcc - BCC
        Returns:
        true if successful

      • openMail

        public static boolean openMail()
        Try to open the default mail client (not to a specific URI, though. See mailTo(URI)
        Returns:
        True if successful
